Package tripleplay.util

Interface Summary
Frames Models the frames of a flipbook animation.
Input.Registration Provides a handle on a listener or action registration.
Logger.Impl Wires the logging front-end to the logging back-end.
Timer.Handle A handle on registered actions that can be used to cancel them.
 

Class Summary
Base90 Encodes and decodes ints and longs to strings in base 90.
Colors Utilities and constants for colors.
DimensionValue A specialized Value for dimensions.
Dragger A helpful class for implementing drag and drop behavior.
EffectRenderer Handles the rendering of text with a particular effect (shadow, outline, etc.).
EffectRenderer.PixelOutline  
EffectRenderer.Shadow  
EffectRenderer.VectorOutline  
Glyph Handles the maintenance of a canvas image and layer for displaying a chunk of pre-rendered graphics.
Input<L> Dispatches user input from a particular source.
Input.BoundsRegion A region that encompasses the supplied (screen) bounds.
Input.LayerRegion A region that encompasses supplied bounds, as transformed by the supplied layer's transform.
Input.Region Encapsulates enabledness, expiry, and hit testing.
Input.ScreenRegion A region that encompasses the entire screen.
Input.SizedLayerRegion A region that encompasses the supplied layer's (transformed) bounds.
Interpolator Abstracts the process of interpolation between two values.
JsonUtil Facilities for parsing JSON data
Layers Provides utility functions for dealing with Layers
Logger Provides logging services that are routed to the appropriate logging destination on the client or server.
Logger.Levels Manages the target log levels for a given ident.
Logger.PlayNImpl A logging back-end that writes to PlayN.
MouseInput Dispatches user input from Mouse.
Objects Utilities that apply to all objects.
PackedFrames A frames implementation that uses a packed texture atlas and metadata generated by the FramePacker.
PackedFrames.Frame  
PointerInput Dispatches user input from Pointer.
PointerInput.Action A listener that will call PointerInput.Action.onTrigger() when the pointer is pressed.
Randoms Provides utility routines to simplify obtaining randomized values.
SimpleFrames A simple implementation of Frames that uses an untrimmed horizontal strip image.
TextConfig Encapsulates a styled text configuration and provides utility methods for rendering it in various ways.
Timer Handles execution of actions after a specified delay.
TypedStorage Makes using PlayN Storage more civilized.
 

Enum Summary
Key  
Logger.Level Tags a log message with a particular severity level.
